ai-kv18.8:1.3_0: They see a sight with their eyes. ...
ai-kv18.8:1.4_0: They meditate spreading a heart full of the ear ...
ai-kv18.8:1.5_0: When you smell an odor with your nose ...
ai-kv18.8:1.7_0: feels a touch with the body.
ai-kv18.8:1.8_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv18.8:2.3_0: he has attained the attainment of consciousness,
ai-kv18.8:2.4_0: because you have not conducted himself properly;
ai-kv18.8:2.7_0: mind, thoughts, and consciousness, you will not say that
ai-kv18.8:3.3_0: mind, thoughts, consciousness, and ear consciousness. And he listens to the ear consciousness,
ai-kv18.8:3.8_0: is included by two kinds of mind:
ai-kv18.8:3.9_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv18.8:4.4_0: Has the first jhāna that remains in the first absorption?
ai-kv18.8:5.1_0: he listens to the first absorption, the thorns, theuncil hears that are called entering.
ai-kv18.8:5.3_0: he thinks, ‘I have the second absorption’, without placing the mind or keeping it connected.
ai-kv18.8:5.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv18.8:6.1_0: he listens to the first absorption, the thorns, theuncil hears that are called entering.
ai-kv18.8:6.4_1: For someone who has attained the dimension of infinite space, the perception of form ...
ai-kv18.8:6.4_2: For someone who has attained the dimension of infinite consciousness, the perception of the dimension of infinite space,
ai-kv18.8:6.4_3: For someone who has attained the dimension of nothingness, the perception of the dimension of infinite consciousness ...
ai-kv18.8:6.4_4: For someone who has attained the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception, perception of the dimension of nothingness, ...
ai-kv18.8:6.4_5: For someone who has attained the cessation of perception and feeling, perception and feeling are stated by the Buddha; and there is feeling.
ai-kv18.8:6.5_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv18.8:6.6_0: The discussion on sounds is finished.
